member.name: M:DG.Tweening.Core.ABSAnimationComponent.DORestart(System.Boolean)
member.param: If TRUE, re-evaluates the tween's start and end values from its current position. Set it to TRUE when spawning the same DOTweenPath in different positions (like when using a pooling system)

member.name: T:DG.Tweening.DOTweenPath
member.summary: Attach this to a GameObject to create and assign a path to it

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.DOTweenPath.DORestart(System.Boolean)
member.param: If TRUE, re-evaluates the tween's start and end values from its current position. Set it to TRUE when spawning the same DOTweenPath in different positions (like when using a pooling system)

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.DOTweenPath.DOKillAllById(System.String)
member.summary: Kills all tweens (path/animations/etc.) with the given ID (regardless of their target gameObject)

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.DOTweenPath.GetDrawPoints
member.summary: Returns a list of points that are used to draw the path inside the editor.

member.name: T:DG.Tweening.Plugins.SpiralPlugin
member.summary: Tweens a Vector3 along a spiral. EndValue represents the direction of the spiral

member.name: F:DG.Tweening.SpiralMode.Expand
member.summary: The spiral motion will expand outwards for the whole the tween

member.name: F:DG.Tweening.SpiralMode.ExpandThenContract
member.summary: The spiral motion will expand outwards for half the tween and then will spiral back to the starting position
